blocks.subject: HBA 2000 Summer Clerkship Program
text: ENA Legal will be participating in the above-referenced program again this
year.   Please note that this program is geared towards first year minority &
women law students.   I will be inviting each of you to participate in
interviewing some of the candidates during the first two weeks of March.
Thanks in advance for your time.
**Please advise if anyone else should be included as an interviewer.
